name: luxscents-perfume-website
description: Luxury perfume website with recommendation system

scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && go run cmd/server/main.go cmd/server/seed.go
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && go build -o luxscents-server cmd/server/main.go
scripts.install:deps: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && go mod download
scripts.check: echo 'Checking ports...' && npm run check:ports && npm run check:deps
scripts.check:ports: netstat -an | grep :5173 || echo 'Frontend port available' && netstat -an | grep :8080 || echo 'Backend port available'
scripts.check:deps: cd frontend && npm list --depth=0 && cd ../backend && go mod verify

author: LuxScents Team
